songs.title: Can't Stop The Feeling - Justin Timberlake
Good Time - Owl City & Carly Rae Jepsen
Best Day Of My Life - American Authors
On Top of the World - Imagine Dragons
Walking On Sunshine - Katrina & The Waves

quotes.text: You glow differently when you're happy.
Collect moments, not things.
Smiles are contagious — spread one.
Happiness is homemade.
Let your light shine.
The sun always rises again.
Do more things that make you forget to check your phone.
Joy is not in things, it’s in us.
Radiate positivity, even on quiet days.
Life is better when you’re laughing.

songs.title: When I Was Your Man - Bruno Mars
Say Something - A Great Big World ft. Christina Aguilera
Lose You To Love Me - Selena Gomez
Crying Alone - Sad & Emotional Piano Song Instrumental

quotes.text: Tears are words the heart can’t say.
Even broken crayons still color.
It’s okay to outgrow people who don’t grow with you.
Crying doesn’t mean you’re weak, it means you’ve been strong too long.
Rain is just the sky crying with you.
You heal differently when you’re gentle with yourself.
Not every storm comes to destroy you; some come to clear your path.
Even the moon goes through phases — you will feel whole again.
Silence sometimes says what words never can.
Let your sadness teach you softness.
Peace is found within, not around.
Slow down. You’re doing fine.
Inhale calm, exhale chaos.
Your mind will quiet when your heart feels safe.
Still waters reflect the most.
You deserve the kind of calm that feels like home.
Let today be gentle.
Even clouds rest before they rain.
Grace is a slow exhale.
Breathe. You are already enough.

songs.title: Shake It Out - Florence + The Machine
Don’t Worry Be Happy - Bobby McFerrin
Stronger (What Doesn’t Kill You) - Kelly Clarkson

quotes.text: You are allowed to rest, not quit.
The storm will pass, just don’t let go of your umbrella.
One step at a time is still progress.
Breathe — you’ve done harder things before.
The sun will rise, and so will you.
Pause. Reset. Try again.
You’ve survived 100% of your worst days.
You’re not behind — you’re on your own path.
Resting is part of the process too.
Courage is quiet when confidence feels loud.
